item.title: About Me
item.description: TLDR; My LinkedIn …. No emotional reasons behind my career choices lay here though! The long(er) version I am Nicky Wrightson, Principal Engineer formally of Skyscanner and of FT I have worked my ways through many industries - Travel, Telcomms, Financial Sector. Not surprisingly as I have been around for a while now I have been witness to many architectures - The good, bad and the ugly … I have contributed to ALL of those too!
